messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
Check out my physique! The rough
seas sculpted this awesome body!
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
I’ve got a muscular physique, but
there’s no strength behind it...
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
Seeing a Pokémon use Surf to carry you
out on the sea...It strikes an emotional chord with me
somewhere deep down.
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
The rough seas almost drowned...
...I mean, sculpted this awesome body!Let my chiseled physique inspire you!
